title: 🌟Large 1 Bed / 1 Bath Southwest Houston
map_address: 9600 Braes Bayou Dr near S Braeswood
posting_body: ['Villas at Braeburn', 'Family and Pet Friendly Community in Southwest Houston, TX', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', '(Diana); Ask for a property tour today', 'Large 1 Bedroom / 1.0 Bath', '800 sq.', 'ft.', 'Rent:', '$865', 'Deposit:', '$400 & ask about our $0 deposit special program', 'Address:', '9600 Braes Bayou Drive | Houston, TX, 77074', 'Link to Website:', '<URL>', 'Link to 3D Tour:', '<URL>', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon-Fri: 8:30 AM-5:30 PM', 'Sat: Appointment Only', 'Sun: Closed', 'This Apartment Features:', 'Granite Countertop', 'Crown Molding', '9Ft Ceilings', 'Breakfast Bar*', 'Large Walk-in Closets', 'Large Spacious Floor Plan (800 sq ft)', 'All Bills Paid via a Budget Friendly Fixed', 'No Deposit Utility Package**', 'Golf Course View*', 'Private Backyard* (2 Bedrooms / downstairs units)', 'All-electric Kitchen', 'Balcony or Patio', 'Tile, Carpeted, or Vinyl Floors*', 'Ceiling Fans', 'Central Air and Heating', 'Refrigerator, Dishwasher and Garbage Disposal', 'Mini Blinds', 'Pantry', '24-hour video surveillance', 'Community Description:', 'Exceptional Apartment living in a family friendly 79-unit community in Houston, TX.', 'Villas', 'At Braeburn is well-located just off of S. Braeswood within walking distance of the Stein Family Park, Braes Bayou hike/bike trails & the BraeBurn Golf Course.', 'Easy access to shopping, schools, I59/69, 610 and the Medical Center.', 'Your spacious apartment home includes a fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops, crown molding, covered parking, Tile/wood style flooring and large closets.', 'Our pet friendly community includes on-site 24-hour laundry, pool, dog park and emergency maintenance.', 'A convenient budget friendly utility package makes budgeting a breeze.', 'Community Amenities', 'Covered Parking', 'Beautiful Landscaping', 'Shimmering Swimming Pool', 'Pre-wired for Fiber High Speed Internet/cable', 'Budget Friendly No Deposit Utility Package **', 'Easy Access to Freeways', 'Easy Access to Shopping', 'Dog/Pet Park', 'Jogging & Biking Trail', 'Friendly Bilingual Spanish/English speaking maintenance & office staff', 'New Laundry Facility with new large coinless washer/dryers', 'BBQ Pit Areas', 'On-call Maintenance', 'Public Parks Nearby (2-minute walk)', 'Guest Parking', 'Access to Public Transportation', 'For more information, visit us at <URL> or Call Diana @', 'show contact info', '.', 'Also, ask about our large 1,000 sq.', 'f.t 2-bedroom floor plan or our jumbo 1,100 sq.', 'ft 2-bedroom floor plan.', ' Note: Some downstairs units come with a private fenced backyard with a golf course view.', 'About this posting:', 'Large 1 Bedroom / 1 Bath Apartment, 800 sq.', 'ft., Rent: $865, Deposit: $400 & ask about our $0 deposit special program', '*', 'In Select Apartment Homes', '**', 'The budget friendly utility package is based on your apartment size; The large 800 sq.ft floor plan is a flat $180 a month; Requires no deposit.', 'Covers Water, Gas, Electric, Trash Service, Bi-monthly proactive pest control.', 'All prices subject to change.']
